title: Token Registration
para: Welcome to our Token Generation Website, a user-friendly and robust platform designed to streamline appointment processes across various departments. aiming to provide a convenient and efficient solution for managing appointments and department registrations.
Discription: TokenGen: 🎫 Efficient Token Generation Platform
Powered by Firebase 🔥: Reliable and Scalable Database
Get Unique Tokens 🆔 Instantly for Various Departments
QR Code Generation 📷 for Easy and Secure Token Verification
User-Friendly Interface: Smooth Navigation and Intuitive Design 🚀
Admin ⚙️ Panel: Manage Tokens and Departments Dynamically 🔀
Quick Access: Generate Tokens with Just a Few Clicks 🖱️
Enhanced Security: Each Token is Unique and Securely Stored 🔐
Real-Time Updates: Stay Informed About Token Status 🔄
Token Expiration: Tokens Automatically Invalidate After Set Time ⏰
Streamlined Appointment Management: TokenGen Simplifies the Process! 🌟

title: Shopify
para: this project was ment for learning purpose were users can login and explore the products and their price and also have expriace of other online e commerse company websites, list there favourite items on cart and audit them
Discription: Shopify is full stack web application
Developed using Nextjs and Nodejs on mongodb database technology
User can create account using ✉️ email id
Admin ⚙️ panel functionality can handle the content dynamically 🔀
User can explore the product by navigation or  searching 🔍 in the website
Admin panel can handle CRUD functionality of products
User can add his favourite  products to the cart 🛒 after login
Admin can see all Panding 🔄, Shipped ➡️ and Delivered ✅ products invoice status
User can generate product invoice 📃 and place order 📌 online
Learnings: Admin panel creation for dynamic management
Next js routing and api handling
Product CRUD operations from admin panel

title: Talker web
para: Chat globally to all the talker web users with real time experiance and follow them to see their daily status updates, share your feelings with others with the help of awsome status, make group of friend to stay connected from anywhere and anytime, send awsome pictures to others and stay connected forever...
about: Chat globally with users and share photos
Discription: Talker is full stack web application
Developed using Reactjs and Nodejs On mongodb and cloudinary database technology
User can create account using ✉️ email otp varifiacation and use the application
Account is varified 🔒 with nodemailer`s otp 🔑 varification
User can interact with others with personal chats 💬 and create groups
Socket programming provides realtime fetching of the messages 🚀
User can also send pictures and react with emojis 😃
User can search 🔍 globally over the platform to find unreachables
Keep your followers updated about your daily activity by daily status 👀
Learnings: User varification using email id and otp

title: I-notebook
para: I notebook helps you to organize notes online with all create rewrite undo and delete options user can search required notes and also tag important note to catagorize them
about: take and maintain your daily notes online for free
Discription: I-notebook is full stack web application
Developed using Reactjs and Nodejs On mongodb Nosql database technology
User can Create account to the service with email id and use the application any time
User's account is secured with JSON webtoken authentication
User can also delete modify and rename the previously stored notes
Searching functionality keeps the notes very hendful to find
Learnings: Learned first time react js and json webtoken and user authentication
Password increption of user and verification of it
